1.0.name: wordpress/skylark
1.0.description: Skylark is a bright, clean, and responsive theme that's a great starting point for individuals and businesses who want to establish a professional online presence. Not only is the theme well-suited for general blogging, but its showcase and portfolio page templates make it easy to highlight latest news and projects in style.
